Snake Case Column Names

{% raw %}

replace_parentheses[source]

replace_parentheses(s)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

snake2words[source]

snake2words(s)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(snake2words('hi_bye__min__'), 'Hi Bye (min)')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

replace_acronyms[source]

replace_acronyms(s)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(replace_acronyms('foo mae Rmse'), 'foo MAE RMSE')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(replace_acronyms(['foo mae Rmse', 'rmse bar']), ['foo MAE RMSE', 'RMSE bar'])
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

DataFrame.rename2words[source]

DataFrame.rename2words()

Renames columns in snake_case to Words.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dummydf().rename2words()
Col 1 Col 2
0 100 a
1 101 b
2 102 c
3 103 d
4 104 e
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class PxLabeler[source]

PxLabeler()

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Use px_labeler for the labeler plotly functions kwarg
